net.kyori.text

Class AbstractBuildableComponent.AbstractBuilder<C extends BuildableComponent<C,B>,B extends AbstractBuildableComponent.AbstractBuilder<C,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kyori.text.AbstractBuildableComponent.AbstractBuilder<C,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the component type
    B - the builder type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BuildableComponent.Builder<C,B>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeybindComponent.Builder, ScoreComponent.Builder, SelectorComponent.Builder, TextComponent.Builder, TranslatableComponent.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractBuildableComponent<C extends BuildableComponent<C,B>,B extends AbstractBuildableComponent.AbstractBuilder<C,B>>

    protected abstract static class AbstractBuildableComponent.AbstractBuilder<C extends BuildableComponent<C,B>,B extends AbstractBuildableComponent.AbstractBuilder<C,B>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements BuildableComponent.Builder<C,B>
    An abstract implementation of a component builder.

    • Field Detail

      • children

        protected java.util.List<Component> children
        The list of children.

        This list is set to an empty list of components by default to prevent unnecessary list creation for components with no children.
